actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay structure relating to medical officers of the uniformed services.

summary.text: Revises the special pay structure for active duty medical officers of the uniformed services to direct the Secretaries of Defense and Health, Education, and Welfare to promulgate regulations through which variable incentive pay may be adjusted to reflect (1) amounts that the Federal Government has paid to, or (2) benefits received by, medical officers prior to the commencement of active duty.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay structure relating to medical officers of the uniformed services.
